#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define PRIME 1000000007
typedef long long LL;
LL fac[] = {1,1,2,6,24,120,720,5040,40320,362880,3628800,39916800,479001600,227020758,178290591,674358851,789741546,425606191,660911389,557316307,146326063,72847302,602640637,860734560,657629300,440732388,459042011,394134213,35757887,36978716,109361473,390205642,486580460,57155068,943272305,14530444,523095984,354551275,472948359,444985875,799434881,776829897,626855450,954784168,10503098,472639410,741412713,846397273,627068824,726372166,318608048,249010336,948537388,272481214,713985458,269199917,75195247,286129051,595484846,133605669,16340084,996745124,798197261,286427093,331333826,536698543,422103593,280940535,103956247,172980994,108669496,715534167,518459667,847555432,719101534,932614679,878715114,661063309,562937745,472081547,766523501,88403147,249058005,671814275,432398708,753889928,834533360,604401816,187359437,674989781,749079870,166267694,296627743,586379910,119711155,372559648,765725963,275417893,990953332,104379182,437918130,229730822,432543683,551999041,407899865,829485531,925465677,24826746,681288554,260451868,649705284,117286020,136034149,371858732,391895154,67942395,881317771,114178486,473061257,294289191,314702675,79023409,640855835,825267159,333127002,640874963,750244778,281086141,979025803,294327705,262601384,400781066,903100348,112345444,54289391,329067736,753211788,190014235,221964248,853030262,424235847,817254014,50069176,159892119,24464975,547421354,923517131,757017312,38561392,745647373,847105173,912880234,757794602,942573301,156287339,224537377,27830567,369398991,365040172,41386942,621910678,127618458,674190056,892978365,448450838,994387759,68366839,417262036,100021558,903643190,619341229,907349424,64099836,89271551,533249769,318708924,92770232,420330952,818908938,584698880,245797665,489377057,66623751,192146349,354927971,661674180,71396619,351167662,19519994,689278845,962979640,929109959,389110882,98399701,89541861,460662776,289903466,110982403,974515647,928612402,722479105,218299090,96415872,572421883,774063320,682979494,693774784,611379287,166890807,880178425,837467962,705738750,616613957,338771924,497191232,896114138,560652457,661582322,224945188,262995829,859081981,857116478,279856786,408062844,406076419,367193638,985761614,767884817,77737051,801784560,410447512,813374614,702909132,777826615,11426636,685259446,721228129,931065383,593559607,860745086,578819198,495425745,893029457,6156532,502193801,37480384,220174401,383076669,3013247,750298503,574624441,230733683,144887710,656590378,773954850,358485371,772254339,469363737,95843299,823414273,87709482,892174648,749756145,185864756,68295241,98238739,131504392,111672419,928208089,687974198,753032165,71715287,506557931,290314197,546089425,174590825,187067364,817659471,309331349,303445769,964814732,112937795,848457973,113604679,263728612,162653895,519013648,956915940,591788795,26960558,818561771,201473695,830318534,283328761,298655153,103269519,567777414,629890782,707451727,528064896,419467694,259775012,452053078,972081682,512829263,412924123,354780756,917691336,648929514,519218426,957710940,848100261,607279584,78508462,651656900,271922065,927371945,976904514,655633282,147015495,44958071,431540693,956102180,821001984,4640954,508310043,709072863,866824584,318461564,773853828,371761455,53040744,609526889,972452623,799173814,723225821,3874155,305590228,289496343,139259591,348260611,756867525,848691744,101266155,835557082,267191274,448180160,518514435,443022120,614718802,151579195,204297074,912569551,137049249,515433810,979001276,524451820,229298431,88837724,892742699,387369393,840349900,206661672,18186411,619853562,246548548,236767938,893832644,930410696,321544423,971435684,402636244,780681725,194281388,661238608,964476271,643075362,439409780,96895678,723461710,915447882,785640606,114709392,933696835,539582134,739120141,300372431,244129985,722433522,26638091,388855420,42468156,647517040,474194942,832805846,958306874,489519451,339220689,9833277,923477502,390998217,790283925,694135631,736657340,609563281,873127083,489593220,264439147,891171227,489029295,502009550,325923608,280525558,857054649,820622208,558213940,216997416,487921842,951328535,606653379,794417402,449723904,783486165,414645478,809681447,114612567,824953206,255016498,147060381,88903008,228293174,394357308,362355866,900088886,638573794,779598451,904922263,451026166,549459329,212643744,563246709,391796933,174243175,189725986,238337196,60051478,782959006,982673239,237607992,685987666,694447544,195840153,519748540,446086975,523485236,185780714,716004996,214280883,140643728,555470704,516522055,116665689,899547947,490696549,683197147,686671136,988747143,744912554,619072836,345158054,224284246,637879131,78947725,342273666,237716550,915360466,711578771,423071394,228124918,271834959,480779410,254894593,859192972,990202578,258044399,151532640,644862529,48049425,448119239,130306338,850105179,401639970,606863861,183881380,837401090,513536652,714177614,946271680,243293343,403377310,688653593};
 
LL inv(LL n){
	LL result = 1,exp,base;
	exp=PRIME-2;
	base=n;
	while(exp){
		if((exp & 1) == 1){
			result = (result*base)%PRIME;
		}
		exp = exp >> 1;
		base = (base*base)%PRIME;
	}
 
	return result;
}
 
int main(){
    int T,i,L[26],U[26];
    LL ans,den;
    char s[505];
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--){
        scanf("%s",s);
        memset(L,0,sizeof(L));
        memset(U,0,sizeof(U));
        for(i=0;s[i];i++){
            if(s[i]<'a') U[s[i]-'A']++;
            else L[s[i]-'a']++;
        }
        ans = den = 1ll;
        ans *= fac[i];
 
        for(i=0;i<26;i++){
            if(U[i]>1) den = (den*fac[U[i]])%PRIME;
            if(L[i]>1) den = (den*fac[L[i]])%PRIME;
        }
        ans = (ans*inv(den))%PRIME;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
